{"id":732640576,"lang":"python3","lang_name":"Python3","time":"4 months, 1 week","timestamp":1656341966,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"143 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/732640576/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Max Area of Island","memory":"14 MB","code":"class Solution:\n    def maxAreaOfIsland(self, l: List[List[int]]) -> int:\n        n=len(l)\n        m=len(l[0])\n        visit=[[True]*m for i in range(n)]\n        tot=0\n        # def check(i,j):\n        #     if i<n and j< m and l[i][j]==1 and visit[i][j] :\n        #           up=  check(i+1,j)\n        #           down= check(i-1,j)\n        #           left=  check(i,j+1)\n        #           right= check(i,j-1)\n        #           return 1+up+down+left+right\n        #     else:\n        #         return 0\n        def valid(i,j):\n            if i<n and i>=0 and j>=0 and j< m and l[i][j]==1 and visit[i][j]:return True\n            return  False\n        def check(h,k):\n                if not  valid(h,k):\n                    return\n                tem=0\n                nonlocal tot \n                t=[];t.append([h,k])\n                while t:\n                    i,j=t.pop(0)\n                    if valid(i+1,j) and ([i+1,j] not in t):t.append([i+1,j])\n                    if valid(i-1,j) and ([i-1,j] not in t):t.append([i-1,j])\n                    if valid(i,j+1) and ([i,j+1] not in t):t.append([i,j+1])\n                    if valid(i,j-1) and ([i,j-1] not in t):t.append([i,j-1])\n                    visit[i][j]=False\n                    tem+=1\n                tot=max(tot,tem)\n    \n            \n            \n         \n            \n            \n        for i in range(n):\n            for j in range(m):\n                check(i,j)\n                     \n        return tot\n                ","compare_result":"","title_slug":"max-area-of-island","has_notes":false,"notes":"","topic_tags":[]}
